segments.text: I am observing a kitchen scene, quite detailed in its line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective gives a clear view of the sink area on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is actively running from the faucet and the sink is clearly overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet, which is quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading onto the cabinet doors and forming a significant puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands directly in front of this mess, polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot is already deep in the puddle, yet she shows absolutely no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of what's happening around them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause serious damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems entirely absorbed, her expression utterly neutral despite the chaos at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and fall in that growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR
